question.en: In which department is Ms. Brant?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/empl-Karen.Brant%40company.org> pv:memberOf ?result .
  ?result a pv:Department .
}

question.en: What is the telephone of Baldwin Dirksen?
Who is the manager of Heinrich Hoch?
What is the email of Sabrina from Marketing?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?department pv:name "Marketing" .
  ?person pv:memberOf ?department .
  ?person pv:email ?result .
  ?person pv:name ?name .
  FILTER (CONTAINS(?name, "Sabrina"))
}

question.en: Who has expertise in Transistors?
Who is our Sensor expert?
Who is the manager of the Data Services department?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?person pv:memberOf <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/dept-41622> .
  ?person pv:hasManager ?result .
}

question.en: Which department is responsible for the Sensor Switch M558-2275045?
How many Sensor Switches do we offer?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT (COUNT(?resultR) as ?result)
WHERE
{
  ?resultR pv:hasCategory <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-Sensor> .
  ?resultR pv:hasCategory <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-Switch> .
}

question.en: What is the name of the Network expert from the Marketing Department?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?employee pv:memberOf <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/dept-85880> .
  ?employee pv:areaOfExpertise <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-Network> .
  ?employee pv:name ?result .
}

question.en: Which departments have Transducer Experts?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?employee pv:memberOf ?result .
  ?employee pv:areaOfExpertise <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-Transducer> .
}

question.en: Which supplier are available to deliver Compensators?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?hardware pv:hasSupplier ?result .
  ?hardware pv:hasCategory <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-Compensator> .
}

question.en: How many suppliers do we have in France?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?supplier) as ?result)
WHERE
{
  ?product pv:hasSupplier ?supplier .
  ?supplier pv:addressCountry "France" .
}

question.en: Which supplier in France delivers Compensators?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?product pv:hasSupplier ?result .
  ?product pv:hasCategory <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-Compensator> .
  ?result pv:addressCountry "France" .
}

question.en: What is the cheapest Encoder we can get from a french or german supplier?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?result pv:hasCategory <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-Encoder> .
  ?result pv:price ?priceR .
  ?priceR pv:amount ?price .
  ?result pv:hasSupplier ?supplier .
  ?supplier pv:addressCountry ?country .
  FILTER ( (?country = "France") ||  (?country = "Germany") )
}
ORDER BY ASC(?price)
LIMIT 1

question.en: Do we have suppliers in Toulouse?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
ASK
WHERE
{
  ?product pv:hasSupplier ?supplier .
  ?supplier pv:addressLocality "Toulouse" .
}

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?product pv:hasSupplier ?result .
  ?result pv:addressLocality "Toulouse" .
}

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?result pv:hasCategory <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-Oscillator> .
  ?result pv:price ?priceR .
  ?priceR pv:amount ?price .
}

question.en: What is the most expensive service we offer?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?result a pv:Service .
  ?result pv:price ?priceR .
  ?priceR pv:amount ?price .
}
ORDER BY DESC(?price)
LIMIT 1

question.en: Who is responsible for the most expensive service we offer?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?service a pv:Service .
  ?service pv:hasProductManager ?result .
  ?service pv:price ?priceR .
  ?priceR pv:amount ?price .
}
ORDER BY DESC(?price)
LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the heaviest coil that does not exceed a base area of 15x15 milimeter?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?result pv:hasCategory <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-Coil> .
  ?result pv:weight_g ?weight_g .
  ?result pv:width_mm ?width_mm .
  ?result pv:depth_mm ?depth_mm .
  FILTER (?width_mm <= 15)
  FILTER (?depth_mm <= 15)
}
ORDER BY DESC(?weight_g)
LIMIT 1

question.en: What products are compatible with the U990 LCD Inductor?
What products can I get from US suppliers that are compatible with the U990 LCD Inductor?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/hw-U990-5234138> pv:compatibleProduct ?result .
  ?result pv:hasSupplier ?supplier .
  ?supplier pv:country <http://dbpedia.org/resource/United_States> .
}

question.en: What is the pontiometer with the smallest volume?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?result pv:hasCategory <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-Potentiometer> .
  ?result pv:width_mm ?width_mm .
  ?result pv:depth_mm ?depth_mm .
  ?result pv:height_mm ?height_mm .
  BIND(?width_mm * ?depth_mm * ?height_mm as ?volume)
}
ORDER BY ASC(?volume)
LIMIT 1

question.en: Which coil has the highest density?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?result pv:hasCategory <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-Coil> .
  ?result pv:width_mm ?width_mm .
  ?result pv:depth_mm ?depth_mm .
  ?result pv:height_mm ?height_mm .
  ?result pv:weight_g ?weight_g .
  BIND(?width_mm * ?depth_mm * ?height_mm / 1000000000 AS ?volume_m3)
  BIND(?weight_g / 1000 AS ?weight_kg)
  BIND(?weight_kg / ?volume_m3 AS ?density)
}
ORDER BY DESC(?density)
LIMIT 1

question.en: In which cities are our US suppliers for LCDs?

query.sparql:
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?result
WHERE
{
  ?product pv:hasCategory <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/prod-cat-LCD> .
  ?product pv:hasSupplier ?supplier .
  ?supplier pv:country <http://dbpedia.org/resource/United_States> .
  ?supplier pv:addressLocality ?result .
}

question.en: Give me a phone directory of everyone on staff who does not manage anyone, I need name, email, and phone, sorted by name?
Do we have any service that does apply to a BOM where parts are sourced from Russia?

query.sparql:
PREFIX prodi: <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>

ASK
WHERE {
  { # all BOMs with parts from russia
    SELECT ?bom
    WHERE {
      ?bom pv:hasBomPart ?bomPart .
      ?bomPart pv:hasPart ?hw .
      ?hw pv:hasSupplier ?suppl .
      ?suppl pv:addressCountry ?country .
      FILTER (CONTAINS(LCASE(?country), LCASE("Russia")))
    }
  }

  # services eligible for parts associated with these BOMs?
  ?s a pv:Service .
  ?s pv:eligibleFor ?hw .
  ?bom pv:hasBomPart ?bomPart .
  ?bomPart pv:hasPart ?hw .
}

question.en: What suppliers - I need name, country and price - deliver the 6th to 10th most expensive hardware items.
Which department have more than 5 employees? I need their names and the number of employees.
Per product category, what's our lightest and heaviest hardware item?
For each supplier, what's the average price (in EUR) of what they sell, round reasonably?
Are there departments with no manager assigned?
I need to update my supplier rolodex, give me every supplier's name and all address details.
For every product, list what other products it is compatible with and the price differences between both.
Which area of expertise is most relevant among our products, what are the top three skills?

query.sparql:
PREFIX prodi: <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>

SELECT ?cat ?name
WHERE {
  ?hw a pv:Hardware ;
    pv:hasCategory ?cat .
  ?cat pv:name ?name .
}
GROUP BY ?cat ?name
ORDER BY DESC(COUNT(*))
LIMIT 3

question.en: For each Bill of Material, how many parts does it contain and what is the total material quantity — show me only those BOMs exceeding 600 total items and ordern them descending.

query.sparql:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX prodi: <http://ld.company.org/prod-instances/>
PREFIX pv: <http://ld.company.org/prod-vocab/>

SELECT ?bom (COUNT(?part) AS ?partCount) (SUM(?qty) AS ?totalQty)
WHERE {
  ?bom a pv:BillOfMaterial ;
    pv:hasBomPart ?part .
  ?part pv:quantity ?qty_ .
  BIND(xsd:int(?qty_) AS ?qty)
}
GROUP BY ?bom
HAVING (SUM(?qty) > 600)
ORDER BY DESC(SUM(?qty))

question.en: I want to update my contact list, for each Employee give me name, email, phone number and the department they belong to as well as their direct report.
Which hardware items are wider than they are tall, and have a depth under 50 mm? List their dimensions.
Which hardware items - list id and name - have no active product manager?
For each manager, what percentage of their entire team work in the same department as the manager?
Which Bill-of-Material has the highest average unit cost of its hardware parts, and what is that average?
Show me any cycles of product compatibility — i.e. product A says it's compatible with B, and B says it's compatible with A (mutual pairs).
Which hardware items have dimensions in the top 10 % of all widths, and what are their IDs, names and widths?
